text.textblock: The USAF Scientific Advisory Board (SAB) General Spring Board Meeting from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. on 20-21 Apr 1994, at Scott AFB, IL.

The purpose of this meeting is to receive briefings and to have discussions concerning Air Mobility Command and USAF Scientific Advisory Board matters. This meeting will be closed to the public in accordance with section 552b of title 5, United States Code, specifically subparagraphs (1) and (4).
For further information, contact the SAB Secretariat at (703) 697-4648.

signjob.textblock: Alternate Air Force Federal Register Liaison Officer.
